QAPair.Question: What is (are) Bronchiolitis - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: Your child has bronchiolitis , which causes swelling and mucus to build up in the smallest air passages of the lungs. Now that your child is going home from the hospital, follow the health care provider's instructions on how to care for your child. Use the information below as a reminder.

What to do for Bronchiolitis - discharge ?

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional
